name: cordova-plugin-ionic-webview
summary: Ionic's Webview extension of the Apache Cordova WKWebView Engine Plugin
description: This plugin is an extension of the Apache Cordova WKWebView plugin. It includes enhancements to resolve some of the issues surrounding XHR requests, along with some DOM exception issues. This plugin only supports iOS 9 and above and will fall back to UIWebView on iOS 8. The WKWebView plugin is only used by iOS, so ensure the cordova-ios platform is installed. Additionly, the cordova-ios platform version must be 4.0 or greater.
